title: React Native Laundry App
description: Built using React Native for cross-platform functionality, with Firebase for authentication and database services. Integrated Redux for state management and React Navigation for structured app navigation.

title: Job Search App
description: Developed with React Native and Axios for API-based job search functionality. Utilizes Expo for development and testing, along with custom hooks and pagination for efficient data handling.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: Developed with React Native, featuring custom components for workout and progress tracking. Utilizes Context API for state management and Stack Navigator for seamless screen transitions.
